data.Name: Pouya aftabi
data.Bio: Pouya aftabi is a Iranian electronic musician, record producer, remixer and dj. Pouya was born on September 20, 2000 in Saqqez, Kurdistan. When he was 13, he started playing the Guitar. By the age of 14, he began playing the Piano and shortly became interested in making music. He also developed an interest in Electronic Dance Music and Future House when he heard EDM Songs on TV and taught himself how to do it by Playing it off YouTube. At the age of 15 Read more on Last.fm
